COUPON_NO,

#{planNo,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{memberNo,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{bizObjType,jdbcType = TINYINT}, #{bizObjNo,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{couponType,jdbcType = TINYINT}, #{couponMethod,jdbcType = TINYINT}, #{discount,jdbcType = DOUBLE}, #{discountAmount,jdbcType = DOUBLE}, #{deductibleAmount,jdbcType = DOUBLE}, #{vailableTime1,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP}, #{vailableTime2,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP}, #{availableDays,jdbcType = INTEGER}, #{issueMethod,jdbcType = TINYINT}, #{issueChannel,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{issueTime,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP}, #{issuerId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{isAvailable,jdbcType = TINYINT}, #{availableUpdateTime,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP}, #{usedStatus,jdbcType = TINYINT}, #{usedTime,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} )

insert into T_COUPON( COUPON_NO, PLAN_NO, MEMBER_NO, BIZ_OBJ_TYPE, BIZ_OBJ_NO, TITLE, COUPON_TYPE, COUPON_METHOD, DISCOUNT, DISCOUNT_AMOUNT, DEDUCTIBLE_AMOUNT, VAILABLE_TIME1, VAILABLE_TIME2, AVAILABLE_DAYS, ISSUE_METHOD, ISSUE_CHANNEL, ISSUE_TIME, ISSUER_ID, IS_AVAILABLE, AVAILABLE_UPDATE_TIME, USED_STATUS, USED_TIME ) values
( #{coupon.couponNo,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{coupon.planNo,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{coupon.memberNo,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{coupon.bizObjType,jdbcType = TINYINT}, #{coupon.bizObjNo,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{coupon.title,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{coupon.couponType,jdbcType = TINYINT}, #{coupon.couponMethod,jdbcType = TINYINT}, #{coupon.discount,jdbcType = DOUBLE}, #{coupon.discountAmount,jdbcType = DOUBLE}, #{coupon.deductibleAmount,jdbcType = DOUBLE}, #{coupon.vailableTime1,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP}, #{coupon.vailableTime2,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP}, #{coupon.availableDays,jdbcType = INTEGER}, #{coupon.issueMethod,jdbcType = TINYINT}, #{coupon.issueChannel,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{coupon.issueTime,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP}, #{coupon.issuerId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{coupon.isAvailable,jdbcType = TINYINT}, #{coupon.availableUpdateTime,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP}, #{coupon.usedStatus,jdbcType = TINYINT}, #{coupon.usedTime,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.select:
select from t_coupon
ORDER BY DISCOUNT ASC, DEDUCTIBLE_AMOUNT ASC
mapper.update:
update t_coupon
PLAN_NO=#{planNo,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
MEMBER_NO=#{memberNo,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
BIZ_OBJ_TYPE=#{bizObjType,jdbcType = TINYINT},
BIZ_OBJ_NO=#{bizObjNo,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
TITLE=#{title,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
COUPON_TYPE=#{couponType,jdbcType = TINYINT},
COUPON_METHOD=#{couponMethod,jdbcType = TINYINT},
DISCOUNT_AMOUNT=#{discount,jdbcType = DOUBLE},
DISCOUNT_AMOUNT=#{discountAmount,jdbcType = DOUBLE},
DEDUCTIBLE_AMOUNT=#{deductibleAmount,jdbcType = DOUBLE},
VAILABLE_TIME1=#{vailableTime1,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP},
VAILABLE_TIME2=#{vailableTime2,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP},
AVAILABLE_DAYS=#{availableDays,jdbcType = INTEGER},
ISSUE_METHOD=#{issueMethod,jdbcType = TINYINT},
ISSUE_CHANNEL=#{issueChannel,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
ISSUE_TIME=#{issueTime,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP},
ISSUER_ID=#{issuerId,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
IS_AVAILABLE=#{isAvailable,jdbcType = TINYINT},
AVAILABLE_UPDATE_TIME=#{availableUpdateTime,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP},
USED_STATUS=#{usedStatus,jdbcType = TINYINT},
USED_TIME=#{usedTime,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP},
AND COUPON_NO=#{couponNo}
mapper.select:
SELECT count(COUPON_NO) FROM t_coupon tc LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MEMBER_NO MEMBER_NO2,MEMBER_NAME memberName,MOBILE_PHONE mobilePhone FROM t_member ) tm ON tc.MEMBER_NO = tm.MEMBER_NO2
AND tm.memberName like CONCAT('%',#{q.memberName},'%')
AND tm.mobilePhone like CONCAT('%',#{q.mobilePhone},'%')

SELECT ,tm.memberName,tm.mobilePhone FROM t_coupon tc LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MEMBER_NO MEMBER_NO2,MEMBER_NAME memberName,MOBILE_PHONE mobilePhone FROM t_member ) tm ON tc.MEMBER_NO = tm.MEMBER_NO2
AND tm.memberName like CONCAT('%',#{q.memberName},'%')
AND tm.mobilePhone like CONCAT('%',#{q.mobilePhone},'%')
order by ISSUE_TIME DESC LIMIT #{rowIndex},#{pageSize}
